amendment.description: Amendment extends the exemption for small businesses to comply with section 404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds to be used by the SEC to enforce the requirements of section 404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 267 - 154 (Roll no. 588).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 267 - 154 (Roll no. 588).
